sentences.en: Once upon a time, people who lived alone tended to be those on either side of marriage—twentysomething professionals or widowed senior citizens.
sentences.cn: 曾几何时，独自生活的人往往是婚姻中的任意一方——或是包括20多岁的专业人士，或是丧偶的老年人。

sentences.en: She was widowed when she was 35.
More and more young men are widowed by cancer.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的男青年被癌症夺去妻子。
